name: First Light
description:
PRESENTATION


This is a 2D old-school RPG in the vein of Black Home and A Plunge into Darkness.

After a devastating Plague purged most of humanity, the few who survived escaped to the underground, in an attempt to survive the disease. After a decade of living in the dark, away from the world. Bahar, and his wife Guidry, believe the Plague has ceased to be and are on the pursuit of a way out, a way back to the world they once knew.

The path is long and perilous, but they will walk it bravely so their children, Dan and Ava, can finally start living instead of just surviving.

FEATURES


A touching storyline that will resonate with all of us given the latest circumstances
An adventurous pace that will keep you on your toes
Explore the underground world, a place full of mystery and dangers
Auto-save feature to keep you from meaningless repetition
